text.english: King Shlomo was known for his wisdom.
He wanted to find the wisest subject.
text.hebrew: הוּא רָצָה לִמְצוֹא אֶת הַנָּתִין הֶחָכָם בְּיוֹתֵר.

text.english: He devised a difficult riddle for all.
The riddle puzzled many people in the kingdom.
It was written on the palace gates.
A young boy named Elad lived in the village.
text.hebrew: נַעַר צָעִיר בְּשֵׁם אֶלְעָד גָּר בַּכְּפָר.

text.english: Elad loved to solve puzzles and riddles.
He heard about the king's challenge.
text.hebrew: הוּא שָׁמַע עַל הָאֶתְגָּר שֶׁל הַמֶּלֶךְ.

text.english: He decided to attempt solving the riddle.
text.hebrew: הוּא הֶחְלִיט לְנַסּוֹת לִפְתּוֹר אֶת הַחִידָה.

text.english: Elad studied the riddle very carefully.
text.hebrew: אֶלְעָד לָמַד אֶת הַחִידָה בִּקְפִידָה רַבָּה.

text.english: He thought creatively and from different angles.
text.hebrew: הוּא חָשַׁב בְּצוּרָה יְצִירָתִית וּמִזָּוִיּוֹת שׁוֹנוֹת.

text.english: While others thought literally, he did not.
text.hebrew: בְּעוֹד אֲחֵרִים חָשְׁבוּ בְּאוֹפֶן מִילּוּלִי, הוּא לֹא.

text.english: Elad found a unique and clever solution.
He went to the palace confidently.
Guards allowed him to meet the king.
text.hebrew: הַשּׁוֹמְרִים אִפְשְׁרוּ לוֹ לִפְגּוֹשׁ אֶת הַמֶּלֶךְ.

text.english: King Shlomo asked for his answer.
Elad explained his reasoning clearly.
The king was impressed by Elad's wisdom.
"You have solved the riddle," he said.
King Shlomo appointed Elad as an advisor.
text.hebrew: הַמֶּלֶךְ שְׁלֹמֹה מִינָּה אֶת אֶלְעָד לְיוֹעֵץ.

text.english: Elad helped the king make wise decisions.
text.hebrew: אֶלְעָד עָזַר לַמֶּלֶךְ לְקַבֵּל הַחְלָטוֹת חֲכָמוֹת.

text.english: The kingdom prospered under their guidance.
People admired Elad's intelligence and humility.
text.hebrew: אֲנָשִׁים הֶעֱרִיכוּ אֶת חוֹכְמָתוֹ וּצְנִיעוּתוֹ שֶׁל אֶלְעָד.

text.english: He encouraged others to think creatively.
text.hebrew: הוּא עוֹדֵד אֲחֵרִים לַחְשׁוֹב בְּצוּרָה יְצִירָתִית.

text.english: Elad remained humble despite his success.
The king and Elad became close friends.
Together, they brought peace to the land.

comprehension_questions.question: אֵיךְ הִצְלִיחַ אֶלְעָד לִפְתּוֹר אֶת הַחִידָה?
מָה קָרָה לְאַחַר שֶׁאֶלְעָד פָּתַר אֶת הַחִידָה?

call_to_action.text: אִם הַסִּיפּוּר נָתַן לָכֶם הַשְׁרָאָה, אַל תִּשְׁכְּחוּ לְהֵירָשֵׁם לָעָרוּץ שֶׁלָּנוּ לְעוֹד תּוֹכֶן מְעוֹרֵר מַחְשָׁבָה!
